thread.title: Stars of Disney take to the ice in skating spectacular
thread.title_full: Stars of Disney take to the ice in skating spectacular | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Stars of Disney take to the ice in skating spectacular
text:
Play video Disney on Ice has started a nationwide tour which will go to Manchester, Sheffield, Birmingham and London.
The show sees some of the favourite characters from the big screen take to the ice with sensational skating and special effects.
Ross Hutchinson has been to find out more and spoken to cast members, some of whom come from the South.
Last updated Tue 13 Oct 2015 Entertainment Essex Buckinghamshire Berkshire Dorset Sussex Kent Wiltshire Oxfordshire Surrey Hampshire & Isle of Wight
